channel.title: Poem for school
channel.description:
I have a poem and it's due TOMARROW. It has to be about guns being bad. This is the format. _________(rhyme 1) _________(rhyme 1) _________(rhyme 1) _________(rhyme 2) _________(rhyme 2) _________(rhyme 2) _________(rhyme 3) _________(rhyme 3)
I'm not good at poetry, this is my poem, hope I get an A+ on it, as I have a D in English Class
Bang Bang it's no game, If you dare to take aim, Prepare to take blame. Some may think you're insane, There is no personal gain, And in the end you could be slain. If you use your head, You won't end up dead.
Hate it? Love it? Tell me what you think!

item.title: Poem for school
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

You seem to forget guns can be used for protection
Go anywhere without a sniff or detection
Walkin alone someone picks a fight, they pull out a knife, give you a fright
You back up tight, think the right, end the fight

… and save your life.

Read full topic

item.title: Poem for school
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:12, topic:379050”]The coldest steel
Flashes in the light
As it sends its victims
Into eternal night

The coldest blood
Flows through the veins
Of those whose work
Breeds others’ pains

The power of death
Held in one hand
Life hangs in limbo
Waiting for your command

One flick of the finger
A synapse speaks
And from the barrel
A bullet leaps

So now you play God
Six rounds at a time
You’ve unleashed the chaos
The flame’s left you blind

Now that the evil
Into this world has been born
The peace that it shattered
Cannot be restored

Claiming to act
In the interest of justice
You’ve only proven
How mighty blood lust is[/quote]
A synapse speaks? You mean neuron?

Read full topic

item.title: Poem for school

[quote=“Jc22493, post:11, topic:379050”][quote author=drunk mario link=topic=474905.msg3474340#msg3474340 date=1295561395]

Ehh… It’s okay… I dont like how almost all of the last words ryhme. You’ll probably get a good grade though.

they rhyme cause thats what my teacher instructed me to do
[/quote] I know, Your teacher is a complete failure in the butt.

So Shel Silverstein is a failure in the butt, right?[/quote] possibly… i never said that though.

Read full topic

item.title: Poem for school
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

The coldest steel
Flashes in the light
As it sends its victims
Into eternal night

The coldest blood
Flows through the veins
Of those whose work
Breeds others’ pains

The power of death
Held in one hand
Life hangs in limbo
Waiting for your command

One flick of the finger
A synapse speaks
And from the barrel
A bullet leaps

So now you play God
Six rounds at a time
You’ve unleashed the chaos
The flame’s left you blind

Now that the evil
Into this world has been born
The peace that it shattered
Cannot be restored

Claiming to act
In the interest of justice
You’ve only proven
How mighty blood lust is

item.title: Poem for school
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Poetry takes time and patience. You can’t just write random lines and verses and hope for it to come out great, although some have achieved that, but not with “Bang Bang it’s no game”…

wikiHow

How to Write a Poem

Writing a poem is all about observing the world within or around you. A poem can be about anything, from love to loss to the rusty gate at the old farm. Writing poetry can seem daunting, especially if you do not feel you are naturally...

Read full topic

item.title: Poem for school
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I have a poem and it’s due TOMARROW. It has to be about guns being bad.
This is the format.
_________(rhyme 1)
_________(rhyme 1)
_________(rhyme 1)
_________(rhyme 2)
_________(rhyme 2)
_________(rhyme 2)
_________(rhyme 3)
_________(rhyme 3)

I’m not good at poetry, this is my poem, hope I get an A+ on it, as I have a D in English Class

Bang Bang it’s no game,
If you dare to take aim,
Prepare to take blame.
Some may think you’re insane,
There is no personal gain,
And in the end you could be slain.
If you use your head,
You won’t end up dead.

Hate it? Love it? Tell me what you think!

Read full topic
